comment: The textbook is your actual professor. Mr. Morris just mumbles the lecture and randomly scribbles on the board. As a result, one test's class average was less than 50. However, you may have a chance with his generous curve.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: This professor is horrible for two reasons. You literally CANNOT UNDERSTAND HIM. He doesn't know how to speak properly. You also cannot understand his sloppy writing on the board. Essentially the lectures are useless. Everyone in class ignored him so we could focus on the book and learn. He takes forever to grade if the stuff gets graded. Hard Test

Cant understand his voice at all, cant read his handwriting. If you take this class, you need to be prepared to teach yourself all the material.  Every class starts with a quiz then he will read through the textbook really fast and ask if theres any questions, then moves on. Having to retake this class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--TEST HEAVY

comment: He knows the material, but he mumbles. Also, his handwriting is hard to read, so understanding him can be difficult and frustrating. There's a quiz at the beginning of every class over the material from last class. Pay attention to the way he solves problems because he'll take off points on the test. Don't take if you've never taken calculus before
Old man mumbler, terrible handwriting, really difficult to understand him when he speaks or writes! I'm sure he knows his stuff, but I can't learn well from someone like this. I dropped the class.

He speaks way too quickly in a monotone voice. He has no idea of how to put things into simple terms. Attendance is not mandatory but there is a 2-6 point quiz at the beginning of every class. But he's easy. Problems on the tests are right from the homework (which he doesn't grade) and study guide and test is open book/note so you can use them on it

RESIST THE URGE TO RUN! Attendance is not mandatory, but highly recommended.  Quiz each class (usually #4 or 6 from book exercises) which counts as 20% of final grade. 3 other exams and a cummulative final-all open notes/book. Many test questions are very close 2 problems from book, so keep your work organized! Got an A-20 yrs after taking algebra!

ah ah, mumbs 10 students have walked out it first day. What is KSU thinking? Any questions so far. One student was playing "Another bites the dust" in the background because so many students walked out.

You can't understand one word he says or read one ounce of writing. He takes forever to respond to email. The daily quizzes are trick questions or problems that he's never gone over. I'd switch classes but he's the only one teaching at a time I can get to campus. Absolutely HORRIBLE PROFESSOR!!! AVOID THIS PROFESSOR. Oddly, he's a human calculator.

You can't understand one word he says or read one ounce or writing. He takes forever to respond to email. The daily quizzes are trick questions or problems that he's never gone over. I'd switch classes but he's the only one teaching at a time I can get to campus. Absolutely HORRIBLE PROFESSOR!!! AVOID THIS PROFESSOR. Oddly, he's a human calculator.
Hardest class I have ever taken, quiz everyday, test take more then the allowed time, doesn't answer your questions, handwritten sucks, he knows his stuff but doesn't explain it in the easiest form

Calc Spring '08. This guy is a joke, I can't believe he's a real teacher, every class I thought Ashton Kutcher was about to pop out and say "you got Punk'd!" His handwriting is God awful, he talks like a auctioneer speaking pig Latin, and is probably the least helpful teacher I've ever met. I sat in the front, studied as much as I could, and yet...
THIS GUY CAN NOT SPEAK CLEAR, NOR CAN HE WRITE NEAT ENOUGH SO THAT YOU CAN READ HIS NOTES ON THE BOARD. I GOT UP AND LEFT 10 MINS INTO THE CLASS. MY ADVICE IS TO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME.

Definite communication problems. Sat through 2 lectures and complained to the dept chair: he never heard a complaint about this guy! Dropped the class so I have no idea about the ease of his tests. I felt ripped off paying for class instruction to have an unintelligible person read to me from the text. He was a distraction, not an aid to learning.
If you like quizzes every class, no study guides and tests with 50-60 point curves because they are so difficult, then this is the guy for you.

I'm a teacher and this guy is terrible.  Be prepare to extra, extra studying outside the class.  He does fart and burp in class.  He does not answer questions very well and seems to avoid them by answering them way over your head.  The test are extremely hard.  He does not follow how to solves problem as the textbook shows.  You will need to find time for the MathLab.
No Comments

He is the worst professor I have ever had. He can't explain the material. All he does is read from the book. Everyone in the class looked like they were in another planet. DO NOT EVER TAKE THIS CLASS, I AM SERIOUS. Needless to say I dropped the class. WORST PROFESSOR EVER.

i hated this guy, u ask a ? he answers it and u still dont understand, u keep askin him and then u just give up, his quizes were pretty easy though if u did the homework and u have common sense.i made a B. but i hate this guy i wish i had another professor.
Very easy class if you're good in math.  All the quizzes and tests are from the easy section of the problems.  But if you need instruction to learn, then I'd sign up for another professor.

Very poor teaching skills. Simply, do not take this class. You can not understand what he is saying, niether can you understand his examples.  Most of the time he reads from the book and expect you to already know the definitions and how they apply to the math problem. RUN, RUN, RUN!!! DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS.

Terrible, just dropped the class due to the fact that not a single word he says makes sense. Feels as if you are in an auction. Terrible teacher and all most people will get is either an F or a W on your transcript.

I agree with previous listing totally. I know it sound incredible but believe it! Definitely would not recommend. Hard to understand lectures and excercises in class. I have spent most of my time in the math lab every Saturday.

This man is the worst, I asked for help 5X in one class & he didn't help me. He burps in mid-lecture & farts when he walks. Avoid him at all costs. Many students sat in another profs. class just to understand what this guy was saying.
